Absorption coefficient of pure ice infered from: Warren, S. G., and
R. E. Brandt (2008), Optical constants of ice from the ultraviolet to
the microwave: A revised compilation.  J. Geophys. Res., 113, D14220,
doi:10.1029/2007JD009744. See
http://www.atmos.washington.edu/ice_optical_constants/

Column 1: Wavelength [m]
Column 2: Absroption coefficient [1/m]
*/
